title: How to stop scripters
body:
How do you stop them, other than reporting at end game.

Just had 3 in a row, and they were never hit by skill shots, always stutterstepping, even when their were walls either side of them, this is bronze/silver, nobody (bar smurfs (and even then)) have enough skill to perma dodge every single skill shot

replies.body:
botoflegends strikes again.. 

Riot are fucking useless when it comes to bots/scripts.
all you can do is report them.
